title: Круги на воде
overview: Raya is forced to leave medical school and go to work for a cleaning company to pay for an expensive operation for her sick father Andrei Vetrov.One day, while cleaning a luxury apartment, Raya meets the owner of the apartment, a representative of the golden youth Pavel Olkhovsky. The young people fall in love with each other. But Pavel's mother, the owner of a business empire Inga, is categorically against her son's relationship with a simple cleaner: she dreams of marrying him to the daughter of her main competitor Evgeny Sokolov. Together with the company's lawyer Viktor Danilov, Inga comes up with a plan to get rid of the girl. Will Raya be able to save her love and find happiness?..
